description:
Be the 1st to Know! 365Scores helps you become an EXPERT OF THE GAME with Live Scores, Pre-Game Stats and Predictions, In-Depth Data, News Updates, Upcoming Fixtures, Lineups - and everything else you need to stay connected to your favorite players, teams, and competitions.

Join over 150 million sports fans who rely on 365Scores for real-time updates, pre-game stats and in-depth insights.

* EXTENSIVE SPORTS COVERAGE
Follow the UEFA Champions League, English Premier League, LaLiga, NBA, Wimbledon, and 2000+ competitions in 10 different types of sports, including top football, basketball, tennis events and much more – all in one live scores app.

* LIVE FOOTBALL RESULTS
Get all the latest football news and updates, right at your fingertips! Football scores from your favorite football teams, such as Real Madrid, Manchester City, Liverpool and much more!

* EXCLUSIVE iOS FEATURES
365Scores offers two powerful iOS widgets to keep you closer to the game than ever:
Home Screen Widget – Instantly view your personalized My Scores list with live and upcoming games — right on your home screen. Perfect for quick updates and easy access to the matches you care about.
Live Activities – View real-time scores directly on your home screen, even when your phone is locked.

* TEAM NEWS & STATS
No matter which team you support, 365Scores delivers everything you need: live scores, sports news, squad updates, real-time stats, league tables, transfer updates, and social media buzz.

* PRE-GAME STATS & PREDICTIONS
Get a competitive edge with our comprehensive pre-game stats, including head-to-head records, recent form, key player analysis, and expert insights. These data-driven predictions help you to prepare for each game. Stay ahead of the game with 365Scores!

* CUSTOM SPORTS SCOREBOARD
Choose your favorite teams and leagues to follow, or pick matches instantly.
Get real-time football updates whenever you need them.

* INSTANT MATCH NOTIFICATIONS
Stay updated with instant match alerts! Follow every play with our Live Match Tracker, even when you can’t watch live
Warning! Our live match notifications may be faster than your match stream!

* LIVE SPORTS CALENDAR
Check our ALL SCORES tab, the most updated multi-sport calendar that you can find.
365Scores delivers full coverage of 9 sports: Football, Basketball, Tennis, American Football, Baseball, Handball, Ice Hockey, Rugby and Volleyball - with more than 2,000 competitions, including: UEFA Champions League, English Premier League, Spanish LaLiga, German Bundesliga, Italian Serie A, AFC Champions League, NBA, NFL, NHL, MLB, Wimbledon and much more!

Be an expert of the game with 365Scores – download now and never miss a moment!

We’re always happy for any feedback! 
Email: contact@365scores.com
Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/365Scores
Instagram:  https://www.instagram.com/365scores
Follow us on X:  https://x.com/365scores

Terms of use: https://365scores.info/pages/terms
Privacy Policy: https://365scores.info/pages/privacy

Yacine TV - ياسين تيفي delivers live football scores, match updates, and league standings from competitions worldwide. Get instant access to match information, detailed statistics, and real-time updates.

Features:

- Live Scores: Track ongoing matches with real-time score updates, goals, cards, and substitutions.
- Match Details: View complete match information, event timelines, venue details, and team statistics.
- League Standings: Browse complete league tables with team rankings, points, and goal differences. Color-coded positions show Champions League, Europa League, and relegation zones.
- Today's Fixtures: See all scheduled matches with times in your local timezone.
- Global Coverage: Search and follow football leagues from around the world. Save your favorites for quick access.
- Customization: Switch between dark and light themes. Pull-to-refresh for instant updates.


Subscriptions & Premium Access:

Yacine TV - ياسين تيفي offers optional auto-renewable subscriptions to unlock premium features and an ad-free experience:
- Weekly Plan: $4.99 per week
- Monthly Plan: $13.99 per month
- Yearly Plan: $24.99 per year
- Privacy Policy: https://sites.google.com/view/matchlivecrf/home

Payments are handled securely through your Apple ID. Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can manage or cancel your subscriptions at any time via your device settings.

What Makes Mubarti Special?
1. Browse Fields Easily:
Explore a wide range of sports fields near you, equipped for various sports.
View detailed information for each field, including location, cost, available times, and facilities.
Use the quick search feature to find the best fields around you.
2. Simple Field Booking:
Book your favorite field in a few simple steps through the app.
Choose the time that suits you and your friends, and get instant booking confirmation.
Pay securely and effortlessly with flexible payment options.
3. Create and Join Teams:
Start your sports journey by creating your own team.
Add your friends, or join new teams and connect with players who share your passion.
Choose your preferred position, like striker, defender, or goalkeeper, and immerse yourself in your team.
4. Discover Upcoming Matches:
Find matches that are starting soon or about to fill up.
Join quickly and secure your spot before it’s too late.
Perfect for individuals or teams looking for new matches to participate in.
5. Easy Booking Management:
Track all your past and upcoming bookings through a simple user interface.
Modify or cancel bookings as needed.
Review booking details such as match time, location, and player count.
6. Instant Notifications and Reminders:
Receive notifications to remind you of your scheduled matches.
Stay updated on new matches you can join.
Ensure you never miss a chance to play with your friends.
Why Choose Mubarti?
A simple and easy-to-use interface.
Modern design that ensures a seamless experience for all users.
Comprehensive app supporting multiple sports.
Effortless interaction with players and teams.
Smart notification and alert system for a stress-free experience.
How to Get Started?
Download Mubarti from the store.
Create an account and choose your favorite sport.
Browse available fields and book effortlessly.
Join a team or create your own, and start playing right away!
Join the Mubarti Community Now!
No more hassle in organizing matches or finding suitable fields. With Mubarti, everything is at your fingertips! Whether you’re looking for a new team, want to book a field, or join a match, Mubarti makes your sports experience more enjoyable and convenient.

Download the app today and start your sports journey with Mubarti – Your sport, your time, your fun!

Join over 20 million fans who trust FotMob to keep them informed.

FotMob gives you all the live scores, stats, and news you need to keep up with football from anywhere in the world. With personalized alerts and lightning fast match updates, you'll always stay informed about your favorite teams and players. Our mission is simple: We're changing the way the world follows football.

Key features include:
• Live scores with instant goal notifications
• Personalized news and alerts for your favorite clubs and players
• Home screen widgets with news and live matches
• Detailed match stats, including xG and shot maps
• Video highlights and audio commentary
• Live text commentary to follow the action as it happens
• Transfer updates and breaking news
• TV schedules so you know exactly when and where to watch
• Weekly Team of the Week (TOTW) and player ratings

We cover more than 400 competitions globally, including the Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Ligue 1, MLS, Champions League, Liga MX, FA Women’s Super League, Eredivisie, World Cup 2026, and many more.

Experience the Ultimate Live Score App—Sofascore! Your go-to destination for all scores, sports statistics, and a world of sports excitement! Whether you are a passionate sports fan or a serious football fantasy manager, we have everything, from simple live scores to deep statistics and detailed player analysis. We cover 25 sports (from football and tennis to darts and cricket) and more than 5,000 leagues and tournaments. With the Sofascore app, you won’t miss a thing!

Download Sofascore now and never miss another moment in sports! 

Why choose Sofascore?

• Fast & Precise: Instant notifications, flash scores, and results – enjoy the fastest updates on the planet
• Top Leagues: Stay atop elite competitions with live scores and fixtures & find a complete season overview
• Player Insights: Detailed stats on goals, player performances, and sports events – be the first to know
• Comprehensive Coverage: Dive into all the live scores and fixtures from top leagues and tournaments worldwide

Explore Extensive Sports Features:

• Statistical Ratings: Access over 300 statistics used by pros, news sites, and analysts for a comprehensive view
• Attribute Overview: Visualize key player attributes to gauge their completeness quickly
• Attack Momentum: Track match dynamics and team pressure intensity with a unique graph
• Box Score & ShotMap: Get the details of every match—every point, assist, and shooting pattern
• Power Graph: Witness the flow of matches, showcasing the dominance level of the winning player
• Heatmap: Visualize player movements on the pitch for every match and the entire season
• Head-to-Head: Compare teams and players head-to-head, analyzing their performance history and rivalry

Discover a wide range of sports, leagues and tournaments in the Sofascore live score app:

• Football - Premier League, UEFA Champions League, UEFA Europa League, Bundesliga, LaLiga, Serie A, Ligue 1, Brasileirão Série A, UEFA European Championshio (EURO), FIFA World Cup
• Basketball - NBA, EuroLeague, FIBA World Cup, Stoiximan Basket League, Serie A, Liga ACB
• Tennis - ATP Tour, WTA Tour, Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), Davis Cup
• Table Tennis - ITTF World Table Tennis Championships, Table Tennis World Cup
• Ice Hockey - NHL, KHL, IIHF World Championship
• eSports - LoL, Dota 2, CS:GO 2
• Handball - IHF World Handball Championship, Bundesliga, EHF Champions League
• Volleyball - FIVB Volleyball World Championship, Nations League, Champions League
• Baseball - MLB, LMB, Pro Yakyu - NPB
• American Football - NFL, NCAA
• MMA - UFC, Bellator, KSW, Rizin, PFL
• Motorsport - Formula 1, NASCAR, MotoGP, WRC
• Cricket - ICC World Cup, Indian Premier League (IPL)

and the rest of the sports we cover - Rugby, Darts, Snooker, Futsal, Minifootball, Badminton, Aussie Rules, Beach Volleyball, Water polo, Cycling, Floorball, Bandy.

description:
****Hryfine bracelets are non-medical devices. The measurement data and results are for reference only, not for diagnosis and treatment. * * * * *

Special Reminder: APP data is for reference only and is not used as a medical diagnosis. You should consult your doctor before using APP and making any medical decisions.

1, Home Sports: record your exercise data, set exercise goals and calculate whether the goal is achieved, steps, distance, calorie consumption, etc.;

2. Sleep monitoring: it can record the sleep duration and sleep quality in the set period, and count the duration of deep sleep, light sleep and awake, so that you can improve the sleep quality;

3. When the phone searches for the bracelet, the bracelet vibrates. Find the phone through the bracelet, phone vibration and ring reminder, in case of loss.

4. It can remind the user of important information such as call, SMS, WeChat and so on when connecting with the bracelet, to prevent missing important information, etc.;

5. Set an intelligent alarm clock for the bracelet to remind you of sitting for a long time. The bracelet vibrates to remind you to reduce the problems caused by sitting for a long time

6, Remote control photography mode, anytime and anywhere to record the beautiful moment

7, statistics your daily, monthly, weekly exercise, sleep, data display at a glance

8. You can set the bracelet to turn the wrist to light up the screen and light up the screen easily

9. Sports data report: make statistics of your sports data and average data in the last 30 days, as well as your sports standards in the last seven days, and generate reports for easy viewing of sports trends

Prepare your football team every matchday with players like Mbappé, Lamine Yamal, Nico Williams, or Julián Álvarez and become the best Fantasy football manager.
Are you ready to enjoy the authentic experience of being a football manager? Choose your football lineup, have fun with tons of features, score like never before, and lead your team to glory! Win great prizes every matchday in special events!

Compete in DAZN's El Partidazo Fantasy against other users in unique live matches and special events like ELCLÁSICO (Real Madrid vs. FC Barcelona), ELDERBIDEMADRID (Real Madrid vs. Atlético de Madrid), ELGRANDERBI (Sevilla FC vs. Real Betis), or ELDERBIVASCO (Real Sociedad vs Athletic). A different major match and a new event every matchday! By activating the option, a single-matchday championship will be created, and you can build your starting XI by combining players from the event teams. Feel like a true Fantasy coach with one of the most outstanding sports games!

◉ PREMIUM FEATURES ◉
▶ Captain: Name a player captain, and they will score double points for the matchday.
▶ Bench: Add players to the bench, and if a player in your lineup doesn't score points, players from the bench will.
▶ Football Coach: You can sign coaches for your squad and perform the same operations as with players, and they will also score points for you on the matchday.
▶ Formations and Lineups: Enjoy additional playing systems or football lineups.
▶ Loans: Loan out or receive a loan of any player in your Fantasy League.
▶ Ideal XI Bonus: Get more money to manage your team and squad for each player who makes it into FANTASY's Ideal XI.

◉ LEAGUE CUSTOMIZER - OPTIONAL BUYOUT CLAUSE ◉

You can sign a player from a rival football team by paying their release clause. Users in private Fantasy leagues can enable or disable this option as they see fit.

◉ NEW FEATURE: SHIELD ◉
You will have the ability to protect one player per matchday to prevent another manager from activating their buyout clause on them or signing them for their team.

◉ LALIGA FANTASY ◉

Refresh your football team every matchday: LALIGA FANTASY is the only official football manager game, with standings, live match scores, and points based on official LALIGA results and statistics.

Conquer LALIGA and become the best Fantasy football coach!

Play in Public League Divisions: Public Leagues feature divisions that you'll access based on your performance last season, and if you're a new user, you'll start from the lowest division and can advance based on your results.

◉ True Stats Live Scoring: ◉

Player scoring works based on real statistics. Follow live matches while having fun with the only official LALIGA Fantasy football game!

What are you waiting for to create a league with your friends? Manage your club by signing LALIGA's top players... And show who the best football manager is!

◉How LALIGA FANTASY 2025/26 works:◉

1. Register in the app, get a 14-player team and a 100 million budget for signings.
2. Manage your lineup, formations, and playing systems. Adjust your tactics and football lineups until you find your ideal XI.
3. Bid for football players in the transfer market or activate buyout clauses on your friends' players to become the best coach.
4. Invite friends and compete with them in Fantasy Leagues.

Join the Fantasy family and enjoy the best football game as a coach!

description:
Transform your football experience with M Scores - trusted by 10M+ fans for lightning-fast updates, live scores and deep match insights for Premier League, LaLiga, Champions League and 1000+ leagues worldwide 

Get team line-ups, live football scores, match results, fixtures, ratings, team and player statistics from thousands of leagues and tournaments in football, basketball, volleyball, tennis, and F1 for free.

The fastest notifications for football live scores! Premier League, LaLiga, UEFA Champions League and more competitions. Get instant goal alerts, match predictions & live stats.

FAST NOTIFICATIONS AND RELIABLE FOOTBALL LIVE SCORES
Get the latest news from games as the ball crosses the line. Reminder alerts for pre-match, kick-off, half-time and full-time results will come to your mobile with instant push notifications. 

SEE WHAT’S RELEVANT TO YOU FIRST
With M Scores, we prioritize your local leagues so that you can see what’s relevant to you first and foremost.

For example: If the user is in the UK, local leagues and tournaments in the United Kingdom, such as the Premier League, will take priority and will be shown first.

PICK YOUR FAVORITE FOOTBALL TEAMS AND PLAYERS
With M Scores you can closely follow your favourite teams and their matches. Get notified about the goals, red cards, half-time, and full-time scores instantly. 

You can also choose your favourite football players and get notifications about them. If your favourite players are in starting line-ups for their respective games, or they score goals, have assists, sub-in or sub-out, we will notify you instantly. 

DETAILED FOOTBALL STATS, FORMATIONS AND LIVE TABLES
Easily access to detailed pre-match, football live score, and post-match statistics.

View formations of the football teams in many important leagues and tournaments such as Premier League, LaLiga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Ligue 1, UEFA Champions League, UEFA Europa League, FIFA World Cup, UEFA European Championship, UEFA Nations League.

Through ‘Live Table’, follow positions of football teams in their respective leagues and tournaments as scores change simultaneously. Will your favourite football team be able to win the Premier League this season?

TEAM COMPARISONS
View and compare several football stats such as recent meetings between opponents, their form, their home and away results.

PLAYER PROFILE PAGES
With our informative player pages, - take a look at players’ careers and get to know them better.

LIVE COMMENTARY
Don’t miss the games you are not able to watch. Follow the games in depth with Live Commentary tabs in match pages.

TRANSFER MARKET NEWS & RUMOURS
Follow all football transfer market updates, news, rumours and confirmations.

M SCORES FORUM
Share your excitement for the match on M Scores Forum. You can like and reply to other users' comments. You can also join the forum with your Google or Facebook accounts.

BASKETBALL, VOLLEYBALL, TENNIS, F1
With M Scores, you can get live basketball, volleyball, and tennis scores just as fast as football! Follow the games with our user-friendly interface. 

With F1, you will have the immersive racing experience with our radar and live timing screens.

Download the M Scores app now and don't miss a thing! All the information and news from the world of sport and live football scores at your fingertip.
